text: Victor Borg, 1961 Victor Borg (8 April 1916 - 27 June 1996) was a Norwegian physician, novelist, playwright and script writer. Borg was born in Kristiania, and was physician at the institution Blå Kors from 1959 to 1983. He wrote several books on alcoholism and drug abuse, including Trøster og tyrann from 1962, Narkomani from 1970, and Skadeskutt: ungdom og narkotika from 1977. He wrote several plays, scripts for the films Skadeskutt from 1951 and Broder Gabrielsen from 1966, and several novels and short stories. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Norwegian addiction physicians Category:Norwegian dramatists and playwrights Category:Norwegian non-fiction writers Category:20th-century Norwegian novelists
title: Victor Borg
